body_html:
Is there a way to check the device using an op.device? Note that after using the with tf.device(device_name) and then checking op.device all I observe is an empty string.

Is there a way to check device placement without referring to the logs (but rather through attributes of the operation(s)) ?

Note I am using Tensorflow v1.1.0 Thanks
